title: Try Me
description: Two rivals. One law internship. A whole lot of objectionable activity.It wasn’t always this way between us.We were best friends growing up.Competitive? Yeah.Ruthless? Definitely.Neither of us liked to lose.But the intense chemistry?That’s new.The hatred in his eyes?That’s new, too.I should let it go.There’s too much bad blood between our families. Between us.But I can’t.I don’t think he can, either.Now we’re gunning for the same internship.If he thinks I’ll back down, he’s dead wrong.Once upon a time, I lost everything.I won’t let it happen again.Go ahead. Try me.From the author of Want Me comes the second new adult college romance in the Extracurricular Activities series. Expect drama, snark, feels, egregious misuse of private property, a guy who’s way more heteroflexible than he realized, and a semi-sorta reformed bad boy who loves to test him.
author: Neve Wilder
